title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same features as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models in chains & agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model manager, multi-user, dark mode, mobile friendly).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based TUI client for chatting with Ollama models from the terminal with syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & persistence support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama (Android, Kotlin, Scala friendly) with async & streaming APIs.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API for Rails & Ruby scripts.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client with async/await and System.Text.Json serializers.

title: ollama-codellama-vscode
summary: Lightweight VS Code extension that uses CodeLlama via Ollama for inline code generation & explanation.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-compose
summary: Ready-made Docker Compose stacks adding Postgres/pgvector, Redis, and web UI to Ollama for RAG apps.

title: ollama-gpt4all-ui
summary: GPT4All chat UI fork that can connect to local Ollama instances instead of bundled models.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you summarize notes, brainstorm, or Q&A using an Ollama backend.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim language wrapper for Ollama with async HTTP and std/json support.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama with context cancellation and streaming support.
